title: Google\Cloud\Vision\V1\ImageSource
name: ImageSource
description:
External image source (Google Cloud Storage or web URL image location).

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.vision.v1.ImageSource

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.gcs_image_uri
params.description: Use image_uri instead. The Google Cloud Storage URI of the form gs://bucket_name/object_name. Object versioning is not supported. See Google Cloud Storage Request URIs for more info.

params.name: data.image_uri
params.description: The URI of the source image. Can be either: 1. A Google Cloud Storage URI of the form gs://bucket_name/object_name. Object versioning is not supported. See Google Cloud Storage Request URIs for more info. 2. A publicly-accessible image HTTP/HTTPS URL. When fetching images from HTTP/HTTPS URLs, Google cannot guarantee that the request will be completed. Your request may fail if the specified host denies the request (e.g. due to request throttling or DOS prevention), or if Google throttles requests to the site for abuse prevention. You should not depend on externally-hosted images for production applications. When both gcs_image_uri and image_uri are specified, image_uri takes precedence.

methods.name: getImageUri
methods.description:
The URI of the source image. Can be either:

  1. A Google Cloud Storage URI of the form gs://bucket_name/object_name. Object versioning is not supported. See Google Cloud Storage Request URIs for more info.

  2. A publicly-accessible image HTTP/HTTPS URL. When fetching images from HTTP/HTTPS URLs, Google cannot guarantee that the request will be completed. Your request may fail if the specified host denies the request (e.g. due to request throttling or DOS prevention), or if Google throttles requests to the site for abuse prevention. You should not depend on externally-hosted images for production applications. When both gcs_image_uri and image_uri are specified, image_uri takes precedence.
